product_name: Merrell Crush Glove Cross-Training Shoes - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Light, flexible and minimalist, the Merrell Crush Glove Cross-Training Shoes offer girls a great shoe for all training endeavors. Mesh uppers feature synthetic overlays for a glovelike fit with maximum breathability. Rip-and-stick closures and elastic laces provide a secure fit. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. EVA midsoles provide cushioning that makes outdoor adventures easy on the feet. Merrell Crush Glove Cross-Training Shoes have nonmarking Vibram Trail Glove rubber soles for excellent grip and durability. All-synthetic construction makes the Merrell Crush Glove Cross-Training Shoes vegan friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Light, flexible and minimalist, the Merrell Crush Glove Cross-Training Shoes offer girls a great shoe for all training endeavors.
